contentHtml: Example callstack and event loop #Example async function abc() { console.log(8); await Promise.resolve(2).then(console.log); console.log(3); // same .then(() => console.log(3)) } setTimeout(() => console.log(1), 0); abc(); Promise.resolve(4).then(console.log); console.log(6); js #Information Note Macrotasks: setTimeout , setInterval , setImmediate , requestAnimationFrame , I / O , giao diện người dùng render Microtasks: process.nextTick , Promises ,
